command.name: database
command.help: This will track the database status.

command.name: database migrate
command.help: Migrate the database schema to a newer version.

command.name: export langfiles
command.help: Backup language files to a given folder.

command.name: get composertags
command.help: Retrieve a list of project tags from GitHub and show their installed versions.

command.name: get project
command.help: Get the whole project info from GitHub, including issues and issue comments.

command.name: make composergraph
command.help: Graph visualisation for your project's composer.json and its dependencies.

command.name: make dbcomments
command.help: Generate class doc blocks for Table classes

command.name: make depfile
command.help: Create and update a dependency file.

command.name: make docu
command.help: Compile documentation using GitHub Flavored Markdown

command.name: make languageflags
command.help: Compile multiple images into a big one (CSS spriting).

command.name: test copypaste
command.help: Run Copy/Paste Detector (CPD) for PHP code.

command.name: test phploc
command.help: Run Lines Of Code (LOC) for PHP code.

command.name: update languagefiles
command.help: Updates language files on a translation service.

command.name: update pulls
command.help: Updates selected information for pull requests on GitHub for a specified project.

command.name: update server
command.help: Updates the local installation to either a specified version or latest git HEAD for the active branch
